overview: Between frequent bouts with drugs, prison time and spousal abuse, Robert Carrillo had alienated just about everyone in his life -- and most people had given up on him. But a chance meeting with a spiritually connected police officer changed everything. This touching true-life tale illustrates how the power of love and forgiveness, inspired by a relationship with God, can change even the most desperate of lives.
title: 70 x 7: Forgiveness to the Extreme
